CustomField.description: DEPRECATED. Trigger behavior now controlled in the Trigger Configuration page of NPSP Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: DISABLES the Relationships.trigger (Relationship__c, before insert, before update, before delete, after insert, after update, after delete, after undelete) - checking this box will disable a trigger. This can cause erratic and unpredictable behavior in y
CustomField.label: DEPRECATED-Disable_Relationships_trigger
